docs.snippet: Star turns by receiver Julian Edelman and running back LaGarrette Blount have New England playing for another A.F.C. title....
docs.lead_paragraph: Star turns by receiver Julian Edelman and running back LaGarrette Blount have New England playing for another A.F.C. title.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column analyzes success of New England Patriots, who are playing for another AFC title after thrashing the Indianapolis Colts; notes star turns by receiver Julian Edelman and running back LeGarrette Blount.

headline.main: As Usual, Patriots Find Talent Where Others Fear to Tread
headline.print_headline: As Usual, Patriots Find Talent Where Others Fear to Tread

docs.snippet: The N.F.L. is exploring with its existing broadcast and cable partners a proposal that would move some games from the NFL Network....
docs.lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. is exploring with its existing broadcast and cable partners a proposal that would move some games from the NFL Network.
docs.abstract: NFL is exploring proposal under which it would sell six to eight of the 13 Thursday night games it carries on its NFL Network to one of its existing broadcast or cable partners.

docs.snippet: A transformation at the quarterback position has arrived as a new generation of players skillfully combines throwing and scrambling....
docs.lead_paragraph: A transformation at the quarterback position has arrived as a new generation of players skillfully combines throwing and scrambling.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column holds that San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick embodies a new and long-overdue generation of quarterbacks who run and throw with equal skill.

headline.main: The Heirs of Tarkenton Scramble, and Throw, to a New Era
headline.print_headline: The Heirs of Tarkenton Scramble, and Throw, to a New Era

docs.abstract: San Francisco 49ers beat Carolina Panthers, 23-10, advancing to their third consecutive NFC championship game.

docs.abstract: Denver Broncos beat San Diego Chargers, 24-17, setting up for showdown against the New England Patriots for the AFC title.

docs.snippet: Soccer's rule-making body will have more freedom to experiment with proposed changes to rules of the game, such as sin bins, following the reforms which were finalised on Monday, its members said....

docs.snippet: Officials in Minnesota said on Sunday a lawsuit filed in state supreme court challenging the funding of a new stadium for the National Football League's Vikings will postpone a bond sale, according to local media....
docs.lead_paragraph: Officials in Minnesota said on Sunday a lawsuit filed in state supreme court challenging the funding of a new stadium for the National Football League's Vikings will postpone a bond sale, according to local media.

headline.main: Lawsuit Delays Bond Sale for New NFL Stadium in Minneapolis: Report
